scripts.build:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build -p android --profile preview
scripts.build:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build -p ios --profile preview
scripts.build:all: bun run build:android && bun run build:ios
scripts.deploy:all: bun run deploy:mobile && bun run deploy:api
scripts.deploy:mobile: cd apps/mobile && bun run export && bun run deploy
scripts.deploy:api: cd apps/api && bun run db:push && bun run deploy
scripts.blockchain:reset: npm run besu:down && npm run besu:up && npm run contract:compile
